sporamonitor.domain

Class VehicleRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • sporamonitor.domain.VehicleRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Subject<Collection<Vehicle>>

    public class VehicleRepository
extends Object
implements Subject<Collection<Vehicle>>
    A polling repository class to hold the most up-to-date vehicle positions in a single place.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VehicleRepository(HSLLiveClient apiClient)
      Creates a new vehicle repository.
